tweet: Hi, OK the idea here is haiku of EXACTLY 140 characters.  Problem though - 5, 7 and 5 will always be too short - 2x 5-7-5 or something else?
Sorry for delay/my debut this very day/my bad with timing/as penalty I'm rhyming/do go easy guys/I may need several trys/so this poem flies.
Thanks for all the support.  Will get the website up this week to show everyone's work.  See www.sixwordideas.com to see how it will look.
Sorry www.haiku140.com isn't up yet should be finished tomorrow.
Website now up at www.haiku140.com.  Just basic Twitter streams for now.  Will add to ability to Tweet direct next week.
